overview: The incompetent regional manager of the club, Li Gar-Cheng (Sam Hsiung), is used by his henchman Tian Hua to launder money from the company. On the other hand, suspended detective Xu Hao (Liao Wang) accidentally learns that only Li Jiaxing can get evidence of Tianhua's crimes, so He then follows the runaway Li Ka Shing and smuggles him along in search of evidence. Along the way, Li and Xu travel together, with the assassin chasing after them, in a series of embarrassing situations.
title: Raptors Kill Order
